properties.name: portal:teemip-portal
properties.triggers_query: SELECT TriggerOnPortalUpdate AS t WHERE t.target_class IN (:parent_classes)

group.title: Brick:Portal:OngoingRequests:Tab:Recent
group.condition: SELECT IPRequest WHERE (status != 'closed') AND (start_date > DATE(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)))

group.title: Brick:Portal:OngoingRequests:Tab:OnGoing
group.condition: SELECT IPRequest WHERE status NOT IN ('closed', 'resolved')

brick.oql: SELECT IPRequest WHERE org_id = :current_contact->org_id AND caller_id = :current_contact_id AND status = 'closed'

group.title: Brick:Portal:ClosedRequests:Tab:Recent
group.condition: SELECT IPRequest WHERE (status = 'closed') AND (start_date > DATE(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)))

scope.oql_view: SELECT User AS U JOIN Person AS P ON U.contactid=P.id WHERE P.id = :current_contact_id

action_rule.source_oql: SELECT Contact AS C WHERE C.id = :current_contact_id
